Let’s now take a closer look at each of the assets.

More about OFFICIAL TRUMP ($TRUMP)

The TRUMP token is a meme cryptocurrency associated with Donald Trump, the 45th and current 47th President of the United States, and his ideals and beliefs. It is issued on the Solana blockchain as an SPL token and has a total supply of 1 billion tokens, with 200 million currently in circulation as of January 2025.

For more information, read our detailed article What is $TRUMP?

More about Official Melania Meme ($MELANIA)

Official Melania Meme is a meme coin and digital collectible designed to reflect support for the values associated with Melania Trump, the current First Lady of the United States. This token combines meme culture with digital assets. With a total supply of 1 billion tokens, MELANIA quickly gained attention, reaching a $2 billion market cap shortly after its launch.

Learn all about it by reading our detailed article What is $MELANIA?

Log in to your Bitstamp account to start trading and get the Bitstamp mobile app (available on the App Store or Google Play) to trade all our cryptocurrencies on the go!
